name: One Strike (itch) (Feral_Pug)
description:
One Strike is a one on one combat game where it only takes one strike to win or lose.

***********CONTROLS*****************

MOVE - W, A, S, D keys

Attack - left mouse button

Aim - mouse cursor

Block - hold right mouse button

Dash - left shift

Escape - exits the game mode or quits from the main menu

Main menu - click the left mouse button to enter the game level once loaded

*********NOTES*************

You cannot be hit when dashing

You dash in the direction you are moving or if not moving you dash backwards

Blocking will deflect an incoming attack.

Hitting the block button right as the enemy attack is about to hit will counter them and leave them open to attack

Your attack will deflect the enemy attack.

*********
